item.title: How to update the out of date debian docker image
item.description: How to upgrade the some packages 1dpkg -L libssh2-1 # view the package use which files 2dpkg -s libssh2-1 # view the package infos 3# install the checkinstall 4echo "deb http://ftp.de.debian.org/debian bullseye main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list 5apt update 6apt install checkinstall 7tar -zxvf source-app.tar.gz 8cd source 9./configure 10make 11checkinstall --install=no Upgrade the single package in debian 1apt-cache madison systemd 2apt-get install libglib2.0-0=2.66.8-1+deb11u3 relative the docs about debian repo debian releases support versions for stretch old debian 1# pls reference: https://www.
